integrations.zoho crm_description: Export your call intake to Zoho CRM
zoho crm_long_description: Ensure that your Zoho CRM campaign reaches the intended target audience with WellReceived. For every new customer created at WellReceived, this integration will automatically add corresponding contact information to your Zoho CRM campaign list.
zoho crm_instruction: Click the Activate button on the left side of this window.
Enter your Zoho CRM username and password to allow access to WellReceived.
Confirm the action by clicking Allow. The integration will now be activated.

integrations.salesforce_description: Import new WellReceived customers to your Salesforce client list.
salesforce_long_description: Automatically create a new contact in Salesforce when a new customer is created in WellReceived. Kickstart your sales and marketing campaigns with the customers who are already booking appointments with your business.
salesforce_instruction: Click the Activate button on the left side of this window.
Enter your Salesforce username and password to continue.
You will be prompted to authorize access for WellReceived. Click Authorize to complete the integration.

integrations.to_enable_this: To enable this integration, you must allow WellReceived and <APP NAME>to share details
integrations.you_must_select: You must select a business location to continue integrating your accounts. Please try again
integrations.to_host_video: To host video appointments using <APP NAME>, you’ll need to switch off the <APP NAME integration>
integrations.to_enable_your: To enable your team to host Google Meet appointments, you’ll need to open individual profiles and switch on ‘Google sync
integrations.activate_a_payment: Activate a payment integration to accept Booking Page payments
integrations.wellreceived_is_currently: WellReceived is currently syncing your <APP NAME>. Please wait a few moments before de-activating the sync. Thank you for your patience!
integrations.support_team_contact: Chat with our support team from inside your account, call us at <CONTACT NUMBER> or email <SUPPORT EMAIL>.
integrations.integration_meets_complaince: Before activating, make sure that your use of the integration meets compliance and data security requirements, such as HIPAA, in your area <Terms of Service>.
integrations.third_party_integration: By enabling a 3rd Party Integration service, you hereby agree to assume HIPAA liability for your use of this service and agree to our HIPAA compliant <Terms of Service>.
integrations.only_tagged_pictures: Only tagged pictures from your Instagram account will be shown on your Booking page.

integrations.something_went_wrong_deactivate: Something went wrong, please deactivate and activate again.

integrations.maximum_limit_reached: A maximum of 10 emails can be fired out from your account every 30 minutes. Please wait a moment and try again.
